name: No signal (itch) (jacksbaker)
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

No signal is an adventure game. You have to escape an unknown fantasy world . On your journey, you meet someone who gives you the power to be able to escape.  This power will help you survive the unknown world. While escaping, there are multiple traps that will kill you if you touch them. 

Control

AMove leftDMove rightSpaceJumpQDashIInvisibility TTelekinesis

There is an Easter egg in the game. Try and find it!
